short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculates and displays the net lines of code changed on a BitBucket branch or pull request.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Want to know whether your changes add or remove code overall? This extension sums the lines of code added and removed, displaying the total added, subtracted, and net change on a BitBucket branch, commit, or pull request.
